attributes.action: Reduce ILR pathway to 3-Year for existed Skilled Worker Visa holders in UK
attributes.additional_details: Being A skilled worker working in NHS in the UK and contributing into rising the economy, paying tax and support the healthcare system, they deserve the right to have some support from Parliament and Government to be able to apply for ILR after 3 years from continuous residency in the UK and apply for citizenship afterwards.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to look into reducing the waiting number of years to 3 should the skilled worker visa holder have to get the ILR

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707698
